title: Calathea Orbifolia Plant
details: Striped tropical leaves, thrives in shade, weekly watering.

title: Fiddle Leaf Fig
details: Large violin-shaped leaves, loves indirect sunlight.

title: Peace Lily
details: White blooms, removes toxins, shade tolerant.

title: Rubber Plant
details: Glossy leaves, grows tall, easy care.

title: Spider Plant
details: Variegated leaves, produces babies, air purifier.

title: ZZ Plant
details: Waxy leaves, survives neglect, drought tolerant.

title: Pothos Golden
details: Heart-shaped leaves, grows anywhere, easy propagation.

title: Bird's Nest
details: Wavy leaves, humidity lover, compact growth.

title: String of Pearls
details: Bead-like foliage, cascading habit, bright light.

title: Chinese Money Plant
details: Round flat leaves, fast propagation, trendy.

title: Dracaena Marginata
details: Red-edged leaves, architectural form, slow growing.
